column5: this Hippie was camping out in his and yoko's garden, he thought John had written music about him. John explains that he didnt, and his music was about himself and yoko, but what he did next is why so many loved him. What an amazing human being he was....  http://www.wimp.com/campingout/
Very cool! Amazing that he was that approachable considering his fame...And of course that approachability led to his demise...And we all lost an amazingly talented songwriter/musician.
Im not a huge fan (dont blast me, was just a little before my time thats all  But man what a story that dude has to carry with him.
If only he could remember it!
Huge fan of Johnny as well  pretty sure that was from the documentary "Imagine"
John was the best of all the group. Paul has turned himself into a side show freak IMO.  Thanks for posting.
Wow bit of a chill here. Just finished hacking around on the guitar and did 2 John Lennon tunes. Imagine and working class hero. Big fan of Lennon
